about_the_game:
Wield The infamous Grapplestaff! 

In this fast-paced, momentum-based platformer, Grapple & swing to immense speeds. Earn score by crushing the opposition, with various options, there are countless ways to dominate the opposition in this unique fantasy sandbox.

              

Embrace The Chaos! 

Become 'The Grapple-Wizard', a mischievous rogue wizard with one thing on their mind; Annihilation. Ascend great heights in the wizard's bid to overthrow the 'Wizard Council'. 

Built different, but.. 

The Grapplestaff alone will only get you so far. Utilize the different movement opportunities: catapult into enemies, seamlessly slide from wall to wall, propel yourself away from surfaces and into the hearts of your enemies.

Yeah, it's really pointy. 

The Wizard's hat is as pointy as they come! Utilize this and the Grapplestaff to launch the wizard and obliterate whatever tries to stand in your way.

Features: 

  • Robust Movement with a focus on absolute player control.

  • Physics-based grappling system.

  • Adjustable gore system, they bleed green, blue and various confectionery! 

  • Satisfying destructible, if its not bolted to the floor, the wizard will destroy it.

  • Face quirky creatures and abominations of wizardry!

short_description: The Grapple Wizard! Once meager, now mighty, with the outlawed Grapplestaff & very pointy hat, blasts their way through anyone (or anything) that gets in their way! Mischief, chaos, and high speeds have been foreseen in the Wizards quest to ascend the peak of the Wizard Council.
